oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Riders In The Sky - 2017-12-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Riders In The Sky from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 9, 2017.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Riders In The Sky;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comment by Abi Tapia begin in progress / (00:43) Performs Deck The Bunkhouse Walls With Holly / (01:14) Performs Christmas Time's A 'Coming / (03:36) Opening comments / (04:21) Introduction of band members by Ranger Doug / (05:31) Performs Wah-Hoo / (09:31) Face playing comedy bit with musical excerpt from Dueling Faces / (11:52) Performs Corn, Water And Wood / (15:05) Talk about Woody Paul's induction into the National Fiddler Hall of Fame / (15:37) Performs Let It Snow-The Last Christmas Medley You'll Ever Need To Hear / (18:55) Performs Blue Bonnet Lady / (22:08) Performs Two-Step Round The Christmas Tree / (24:07) Performs Rawhide / (26:44) Comedy bit about cowboy vocalizations / (27:32) Performs I Heard The Bells On Christmas Day / (30:25) Talk about the song Woody's Roundup for the movie Toy Story and attending the Grammy Awards / (31:54) Too Slim comedy rap about Eminem /

(33:09) Performs medley consisting of Woody's Roundup / Jessie The Yodeling Cowgirl / You've Got A Friend In Me / (36:53) Woody talks about Ranger Doug's yodeling / (37:20) Talk about recorded music available after the show / (38:23) Performs Jingle Bells / (41:46) Lawrence Welk comedy bit / (42:15) Performs Here Comes Santa Claus / (44:14) Comedy bit with SideMeat / (44:58) Performs SideMeat's Christmas Goose / (47:00) Talk about Classic Cowboy Corral on Sirius XM radio and their website / (48:25) Talks about their 40th anniversary album release / (48:48) Song requests from the audience / (49:40) Performs all songs requested and excerpt of Surfin' USA / (51:20) Performs Cool Water / (57:58) Intros the next song / (58:10) Performs Don't Fence Me In / (01:00:43) Performs Ghost Riders In The Sky / (01:04:35) Closing comments / (01:06:26) Performs Happy Trails / (01:08:06) Final comments by Abi Tapia / (01:08:21) Walk-out music / (01:08:54) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Riders In The Sky (Musical group); Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
